34d39c9b-81da-4b7c-934c-35179ea18903.description: Earners of this badge are Certified Professionals in Financial Advice of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. Certified Professional in Financial Advice are members of The London Institute of Banking & Finance and adhere to working ethically.
34d39c9b-81da-4b7c-934c-35179ea18903.name: Certified Professional in Financial Advice

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Holds a level 4 qualification in financial advice recognised by the Financial Conduct Authority such as the Diploma for Financial Advisers (DipFA) awarded by The London Institute of Banking & Finance
Holds a Statement of Professional Standing with The London Institute of Banking & Finance
Adheres to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Commited to maintaining their knowledge by undertaking and logging ongoing CPD
Promotes financial services as a career choice
Reaffirms that earning criteria is met by renewing their status every 12 months

cd9fda04-b232-4353-adbc-d15bcb189003.description: Earners of this badge are a Member of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. Members adhere to working ethically renewing their status annually.

badge_template_activities.title: A level 3 qualification from the LIBF or equivalent
Adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Reaffirm the earning criteria is met by renewing their status every 12 months

c26c6749-3f7d-468c-b881-92ec892cb4ae.description: Individuals with the Certified Mortgage Adviser (CMA) badge hold the appropriate qualifications for giving mortgage advice, included on the FCA register and are a member of The London Institute of Banking & Finance (LIBF). Since 1879, we have been educating professionals in banking and financial services in line with the needs of the industry. Globally recognised and respected, we are the only banking and finance professional body in the world with degree awarding powers, by Royal Charter.
c26c6749-3f7d-468c-b881-92ec892cb4ae.name: Certified Mortgage Adviser

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Hold membership of The London Institute of Banking & Finance (LIBF)
Adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Be included in the FCA Register as giving regulated mortgage advice
Reaffirm the earning criteria is met every 12 months

00e69511-b181-459f-addf-ca043add2916.description: Earners of this badge are an Associate of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. Associates adhere to working ethically renewing their status annually. Associate status is aimed at mid-career professionals who have undertaken a higher level of professional development.
00e69511-b181-459f-addf-ca043add2916.name: Associate

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Holding a qualification such as an LIBF Banking & Finance BSc (Hons) Degree, Level 5 Professional Diploma in Banking & Finance, Associateship (ACIB), Level 6 Advanced Diploma in Banking in Finance, Level 6 Diploma in Financial Advice or a relevant qualification awarded by another provided recognised by LIBF.
Adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Reaffirm the earning criteria is met by renewing their status every 12 months

0f283378-3a85-4beb-be96-6da4665781aa.description: Earners of this badge are Chartered Associates of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. Chartered Associates are highly qualified, adhere to working ethically, renew their status annually and have years of experience working in the financial services sector.

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Hold at least a Level 6 high level qualification in financial services.
Have a minimum of three years experience working in financial services
Complete at least 35 hours continuing professional development (CPD) every 12 months
Adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Reaffirm the earning criteria is met by renewing their status every 12 months

0d6591c7-8c08-4afd-84e6-a4e1cced30fe.description: Earners of this badge are Fellows of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. Typically more than 20 years’ industry experience of which 5 years must be working in a senior role in the financial services industry
Be an ambassador and adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Build public confidence and trust in the industry
Promote financial services as a career choice
Reaffirm the earning criteria is met by renewing their status every 12 months

fcd5177c-42ba-49fc-98c7-e2ac48087dd3.description: Earners of this badge have completed the London Institute of Banking & Finance Certified Fintech Practitioner course. A six week high-level programme combining live virtual teaching, webinars with Fintech leaders and self-paced study.

badge_template_activities.title: Understanding and experience of working in financial services and/or financial technology
Attendance and contribution to circa 10 hours of webinars and live teaching sessions
15 – 30 hours of self-paced study and research
Completion of a comprehensive online learning journal assessed by the programme leader to confirm understanding and application of programme content

skills.name: Appreciation Of The Benefits And Applications Of Key Financial Technologies
Knowledge Of Different Strategies For Fintech Funding And Growth
Understanding Fintech Business Models And Strategic Options Across Different Financial Services Sectors
Understanding Of How Risk And Regulation Is Affecting Fintech Development Across The Globe
Understanding The Challenges And Opportunities Of Digital Transformation In Financial Services

5ad4dd1d-8871-492b-b781-9bece79740ba.description: Earners of this badge are Qualified Trade Finance Specialists of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. Qualified Trade Finance Specialists continue to maintain at least three of the Institutes Trade and Transaction Banking qualifications, recognising a consistent and extensive knowledge of international trade finance.
5ad4dd1d-8871-492b-b781-9bece79740ba.name: Qualified Trade Finance Specialist

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: To complete one level three and two level 4 or three level 4 Trade and Transaction Banking qualifications from the London Institute of Banking & Finance
To continually recertify all level 4 qualifications every three years
Typically more than 5 years’ experience working in Trade and Transaction banking
Extensive knowledge and understanding of the financing of international trade

skills.name: Understanding Of Key Procedures And Solutions

52fb8e54-e077-4b7a-865f-6b232c568b1b.description: Earners of this badge have completed The London Institute of Banking & Finance Accredited Later Life Lending CPD programme. The CPD programme is designed to maintain and raise the learner’s standard and their knowledge of equity release and later life lending. It will also provide them with the skills needed to provide high quality advice to their clients.
52fb8e54-e077-4b7a-865f-6b232c568b1b.name: Accredited Later Life Lending

Reaffirm the earning criteria is met by renewing their status every 12 months

3f02fa38-2a65-4a73-83e0-2a4f5ff75558.description: Earners of this badge are CeMAP Professionals of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. The Certificate in Mortgage Advice & Practice, CeMAP is the benchmark qualification for mortgage advisers in the UK. CeMAP Professionals have held the qualification for more than 12 months and work beyond the personal development requirements of the industry regulator.
3f02fa38-2a65-4a73-83e0-2a4f5ff75558.name: CeMAP Professional

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Hold CeMAP qualification for a minimum of 12 months
Complete at least 15 hours of mortgage-related continuing professional development (CPD) in the past 12 months
Adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Reaffirm the earning criteria is met every 12 months

11456868-1707-4791-bc73-4c07e9487b57.description: Earners of this badge are Accredited Trainers of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. Accredited Trainers have a proven track record in designing & delivering high quality training courses, & providing support to learners. They also possess an ideal blend of industry practitioner experience, expertise in training delivery and appropriate professional & academic qualifications
11456868-1707-4791-bc73-4c07e9487b57.name: Accredited Trainer

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Continuous professional development, particularly in technical subject knowledge and course design
Typically, more than 5 years’ practitioner experience in the sector and in delivering training to learners
Understanding learners’ needs and providing appropriate support
Receives positive feedback from course participants
Appropriate banking/finance and trainer qualifications
Be an effective representative of The London Institute of Banking & Finance
Adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
reaffirm the accreditation criteria is met every 12 months

skills.name: Track Record In Effective Training Delivery

d133368b-d9a7-4053-b062-8202c9da3027.description: Earners of this badge are The London Institute of Banking & Finance CDCS Advocates. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. CDCS is recognised worldwide as a benchmark of competence in documentary credits, and CDCS Advocates have successfully maintained their CDCS credentials by continuing to develop their knowledge of international trade finance for a minimum of 15 years.
d133368b-d9a7-4053-b062-8202c9da3027.name: CDCS Advocate

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

entity.name: The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Carried out a minimum of 36 hours of CPD (continuous professional development) every three years – known as a recertification cycle.
Recertified CDCS credentials every three years for a minimum of 5 cycles.
Typically more than 15 years working in Trade and Transaction Banking.
Kept up to date with the latest regulations and rules in international trade finance.

skills.name: Ability to perform more responsibly and effectively
Understanding Of Key Procedures And Solutions

b7e74714-cd97-4a23-b458-06c07f04de92.description: Earners of this badge are Advanced CeMAP Professionals of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities for professionals developing their careers in financial services. The Certificate in Mortgage Advice & Practice, CeMAP is the benchmark qualification for mortgage advisers in the UK. Advanced CeMAP Professionals hold the higher level CeMAP Diploma qualification and are therefore qualified at a higher level than the industry regulator requires.
b7e74714-cd97-4a23-b458-06c07f04de92.name: CeMAP Advanced Professional

019facf5-52b6-4380-a780-6561d657fe8f.description: Earners of this badge are approved as LIBF Ghaya Volunteer Trainers by The London Institute of Banking & Finance. We provide lifelong learning opportunities in financial education. LIBF Ghaya Volunteer Trainers have successfully completed a selection process and have demonstrated their ability to provide effective training support in financial literacy to learners.
019facf5-52b6-4380-a780-6561d657fe8f.name: LIBF Ghaya Volunteer Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: A high level financial services qualification

Must meet the criteria for Associate status of The London Institute of Banking & Finance. Typically more than 20 years or relevant banking or regulated financial advice experience with at least five of these at a senior level.
Reaffirm the earning criteria is met by renewing their status every 12 months.
Be a mentor ambassador and adhere to The London Institute of Banking & Finance’s Code of Ethics
Build public confidence and trust in the industry
Helping to promote financial capability and understanding in your local community
Raising awareness of financial services as a career choice among young people
Serving as a regional network committee member
Providing work placements for students

3a8729b2-7624-491b-ac7f-b7eccf612159.description: Earners of this badge are Financial Services Professionals who have attended a series of UK Finance CPD workshops, supported by The London Institute of Banking & Finance. The CPD programme is designed to equip all advisers with up-to-date information that will help them to support older customers with their financial needs in later life. The programme provides the knowledge to identify older customer needs, flag and signpost to the customer what they may need to consider in the advice process.
3a8729b2-7624-491b-ac7f-b7eccf612159.name: UK Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Complete viewing / participation of 6 UK Finance webinars linked to Later Life financial advice

Keep up to date with latest thought leadership for Later Life advisers

5ec22b15-63de-4a17-bb89-21fd356323ee.description: Holders of this badge completed the London Institute of Banking and Finance Certified Practitioner in Specialist Property Finance learning programme. The programme was developed in conjunction with the Association of Short-Term Lenders (ASTL) and Financial Intermediaries and Brokers Association (FIBA). It is designed to build learner’s skills and knowledge of the specialist property finance sector, including bridging finance, buy to let lending, commercial lending, and development finance.
5ec22b15-63de-4a17-bb89-21fd356323ee.name: Certified Practitioner in Specialist Property Finance

issuer.summary: issued by The London Institute of Banking & Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Some knowledge of how specialist property finance sector of mortgage industry works
Undertake approximately 40 hours of self-paced study
Pass a 2-hour examination comprising MCQs and Case Studies

skills.name: Ability to apply understanding and identify most suitable product for customers
Understanding of exit strategies for each product
Understanding of regulatory and processing requirements, and how each of them is underwritten
Understanding of the benefits and risks of different specialist property finance products, to customers and lenders
Understanding of the different types of specialist property finance options
